SA07n935:2: liṅgaṃ tataḥ śāstṛvidhipradiṣṭaṃ gātreṇa bibhranna tu cetasā tat |
SA07n935:4: sa puṣpamāsasya ca puṣpalakṣmyā sarvābhisāreṇa ca puṣpaketoḥ |
SA07n935:5: yānīyabhāvena ca yauvanasya vihārasaṃstho na śamaṃ jagāma ||2 ||
SA07n935:9: dīrghaṃ niśaśvāsa vicintya bhāryāṃ navagraho nāga ivāvaruddhaḥ ||4 ||
SA07n935:10: śokasya hartā śaraṇāgatānāṃ śokasya karttā pratigarvitānām |
SA07n935:11: aśokamālambya sa jātaśokaḥ priyāṃ priyāśokakavanāṃ śuśoca ||5 ||
SA07n935:12: priyāṃ priyāyāḥ pratanuṃ priyaṅguṃ niśāmya bhītāmiva niṣpatantīm |
SA07n935:16: latāṃ praphullāmatimuktakasya cūtasya pārśve parirabhya jātām |
SA07n935:18: puṣpotkarālā api nāgavṛkṣā dāntaiḥ samudgairiva hemagarbhaiḥ |
SA07n935:19: kāntāravṛkṣā iva duḥkhitasya na cakṣurācikṣipurasya tatra ||9 ||
SA07n935:20: gandhaṃ vamanto'pi ca gandhaparṇā gandharvaveśyā iva gandhapūrṇāḥ |
SA07n935:21: tasyānyacittasya śugātmakasya ghrāṇaṃ na janhurhṛdayaṃ pratepuḥ ||10 ||
SA07n935:23: lelihyamānaiśca madhu dvirephaiḥ svanadvanaṃ tasya mano nunoda ||11 ||
SA07n935:25: kāmāgnināntarhṛdi dahyamāno vihāya dhairyaṃ vilalāpa tattat ||12 ||
SA07n935:26: adyāvagacchāmi suduṣkaraṃ te cakruḥ kariṣyanti ca kurvate ca |
SA07n935:27: tyaktvā priyāmaśrumukhīṃ tapo ye cerūścariṣyanti caranti caiva ||13 ||
SA07n935:28: tāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanamasti loke na dāravaṃ tāntavamāyasaṃ vā |
SA07n935:29: yāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanametadeva mukhaṃ calākṣaṃ lalitaṃ ca vākyam ||14 ||
SA07n935:30: chittvā ca bhittvā ca hi yānti tāni svapauruṣāccaiva suhṛdbalācca |
SA07n935:31: jñānācca raukṣyācca vinā vimoktuṃ na śakyate snehamayastu pāśaḥ ||15 ||
SA07n935:32: jñānaṃ na me tacca śamāya yat syānna na cāsti raukṣyaṃ karuṇātmako'smi |
SA07n935:34: ahaṃ gṛhītvāpi hi bhikṣuliṅgaṃ bhrātṝṣiṇā dviguruṇānuśiṣṭaḥ |
SA07n935:35: sarvāsvavasthāsu labhe na śāntiṃ priyāviyogādiva cakravākaḥ ||17 ||
SA07n935:36: adyāpi tanme hṛdi vartate ca yaddarpaṇe vyākulite mayā sā |
SA07n935:39: pāriplavākṣeṇa mukhena bālā tanme vaco'dyāpi mano ruṇaddhi ||19 ||
SA07n935:40: buddhvāsanaṃ parvatanirjharasthaḥ svastho yathā dhyāyati bhikṣureṣaḥ |
SA07n935:41: saktaḥ kvacinnāhamivaiṣa nūnaṃ śāntastathā tṛpta ivopaviṣṭaḥ ||20 ||
SA07n935:43: śāstraṃ yathābhyasyati caiṣa yuktaḥ śaṅke priyākarṣati nāsya cetaḥ ||21 ||
SA07n935:46: nirīkṣamāṇasya jalaṃ sapadmaṃ vanaṃ ca phullaṃ parapuṣṭajuṣṭam |
SA07n935:47: kasyāsti dhairyaṃ navayauvanasya māse madhau dharmasapatnabhūte ||23 ||
SA07n935:48: bhāvena garveṇa gatena lakṣmyā smitena kopena madena vāgbhiḥ |
SA07n935:50: kāmābhibhūto hi hiraṇyaretāḥ svāhāṃ siṣeve madhavānahalyām |
SA07n935:51: sattvena sargeṇa ca tena hīnaḥ strinirjitaḥ kiṃ bata mānuṣo'ham ||25 ||
SA07n935:52: sūryaḥ saraṇyūṃ prati jātarāgastatprītaye taṣṭa iti śrutaṃ naḥ |
SA07n935:55: bahūni varṣāṇi babhūva yuddhaṃ kaḥ strīnimittaṃ na caledihānyaḥ ||27 ||
SA07n935:56: bheje śvapākīṃ munirakṣamālāṃ kāmādvasiṣṭhaśca sa sadvariṣṭhaḥ |
SA07n935:57: yasyāṃ vivaśvāniva bhūjalādaḥ sutaḥ prasūto'sya kapiñjalādaḥ ||28 ||
SA07n935:59: suto'sya yasyāṃ suṣuve mahātmā dvaipāyano vedavibhāgakarttā ||29 ||
SA07n935:60: dvaipāyano dharmaparāyaṇaśca reme samaṃ kāśiṣu veśyavadhvā |
SA07n935:63: sārasvato yatra suto'sya jajñe naṣṭasya vedasya punaḥpravaktā ||31 ||
SA07n935:64: tathā nṛparṣerdilīpasya yajñe svargastriyāṃ kāśyapa āgatāsthaḥ |
SA07n935:67: dhīmattaraṃ yatra rathītaraṃ sa sāraṅgajuṣṭaṃ janayāmbabhūva ||33 ||
SA07n935:68: niśāmya śāntāṃ naradevakanyāṃ vane'pi śānte'pi ca vartamānaḥ |
SA07n935:70: brahmarṣibhāvārthamapāsya rājyaṃ bheje vanaṃ yo viṣayeṣvanāsthaḥ |
SA07n935:71: sa gādhijaścāpahṛto ghṛtācyā samā daśaikaṃ divasaṃ viveda ||35 ||
SA07n935:72: tathaiva kandarpaśarābhimṛṣṭo rambhāṃ prati sthūlaśirā mumūrccha |
SA07n935:75: saṃdṛśya saṃdṛśya jaghāna sarpān priyaṃ na roṣeṇa tapo rarakṣa ||37 ||
SA07n935:78: rakto girermūrdhani menakāyāṃ kāmātmakatvācca sa tālajaṅghaḥ |
SA07n935:79: pādena viśvāvasunā saroṣaṃ vajreṇa hintāla ivābhijaghne ||39 ||
SA07n935:81: janhuśca gaṅgāṃ nṛpatirbhujābhyāṃ rurodha maināka ivācalendraḥ ||40 ||
SA07n935:84: hṛtāṃ ca saunandakinānu'śocan prāptāmivorvīṃ striyamurvaśīṃ tām |
SA07n935:86: bhāryāṃ mṛtāṃ cānumamāra rājā bhīmaprabhāvo bhuvi bhīmakaḥ saḥ |
SA07n935:87: balena senāka iti prakāśaḥ senāpatirdeva ivāttasenaḥ ||43 ||
SA07n935:88: svargaṃ gate bhartari śantanau ca kālīṃ jihīrṣan janamejayaḥ saḥ |
SA07n935:89: avāpa bhīṣmāt samavetya mṛtyuṃ na tadgataṃ manmathamutsasarja ||44 ||
SA07n935:91: jagāma mādrīṃ na maharṣiśāpādasevyasevī vimamarśa mṛtyum ||45 ||
SA07n935:92: evaṃvidhā devanṛparṣisaṅghāḥ strīṇāṃ vaśaṃ kāmavaśena jagmuḥ |
SA07n935:93: dhiyā ca sāreṇa ca durbalaḥ san priyāmapaśyan kimu viklavo'ham ||46 ||
SA07n935:94: yāsyāmi tasmād gṛhameva bhūyaḥ kāmaṃ kariṣye vidhivat sakāmam |
SA07n935:95: na hyanyacittasya calendriyasya liṅgaṃ kṣamaṃ dharmapathāccyutasya ||47 ||
SA07n935:96: pāṇau kapālamavadhārya vidhāya mauṇḍyaṃ mānaṃ nidhāya vikṛtaṃ paridhāya vāsaḥ |
SA07n935:97: yasyoddhavo na dhṛtirasti na śāntirasti citrapradīpa iva so'sti ca nāsti caiva ||48 ||
SA07n935:98: yo niḥsṛtaśca na ca niḥsṛtakāmarāgaḥ kāṣāyamudvahati yo na ca niṣkaṣāyaḥ |
SA07n935:99: pātraṃ bibharti ca guṇairna ca pātrabhūto liṅgaṃ vahannapi sa naiva gṛhī na bhikṣuḥ ||49 ||
SA07n935:100: na nyāyyamanvayavataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ bhūyo vimoktumiti yo'pi hi me vicāraḥ |
SA07n935:101: so'pi praṇaśyati vicintya nṛpapravīrāstānye tapovanamapāsya gṛhāṇyatīyuḥ ||50 ||
SA07n935:102: śālbādhipo hi sasuto'pi tathāmbarīṣo rāmo'ndha eva sa ca sāṃskṛtirantidevaḥ |
SA07n935:103: cīrāṇyapāsya dadhire punaraṃśukāni chittvā jaṭāśca kuṭilā mukuṭāni babhruḥ ||51 ||
SA07n935:104: tasmād bhikṣārthaṃ mama gururito yāvadeva prayāt-
SA07n935:106: pūjyaṃ liṅgaṃ hi skhalitamanaso bibhrataḥ kliṣṭabuddhe-
SA07n935:108: saundarananda mahākāvye “nanda-vilāpa“ nāma saptama sarga samāpta |
